strapiPost.title: Show Off Your Local Knowledge At Shiloh Museum’s Ozark Trivia Night
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Shiloh Museum of Ozark History
strapiPost.content:
How well do you know the Ozarks? Put your knowledge to the test at Ozark Trivia Night on Nov 10 at 7p at the Shiloh Museum of Ozark History in Springdale. 

  • Friendly competition: Register a team of up to six people, or come ready to make friends. There will be a raffle, prizes for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd places, and a prize for the Best Themed Table, so come dressed up in your favorite Ozark attire.  
  • Curious cats: Mr. T., the museum's feline ambassador, invites you to bring your curiosity, your cleverness, and your appetite. Snacks and locally crafted wine, beer, and cider will be available. 

Register before midnight on Nov 8 HERE.
